Uses of Package
dip.gui.dialog

  • Packages that use dip.gui.dialog 
    Package Description
    dip.gui.dialog  
    dip.gui.dialog.newgame  
    dip.gui.dialog.prefs  
    dip.judge.gui  
  • Classes in dip.gui.dialog used by dip.gui.dialog 
    Class and Description
    ErrorDialog.BugReportInfo
    Extra debug information that can be sent, and is included in debug logs or transmitted bug reports.
    HeaderDialog
    A Dialog with an HTML message header at the top, which may be of fixed height (or adjust to fit).
    TextViewer
    Display and (optionally) edit Text inside a HeaderDialog.
    TextViewer.AcceptListener
    AcceptListener: This class is called when the "Accept" button in clicked.
    TextViewer.TVRunnable
    Lazy Loading worker thread; must be subclassed
    XDialog
    Extended JDialog Features: Automatically disposes dialog if close-button pressed, although this behavior can be changed by over-riding close() Closes dialog if ESC pressed (calls close()) Internationalized button text, by default Button constants Help support If non-modal, automatically closes the dialog when the World object changes.
  • Classes in dip.gui.dialog used by dip.gui.dialog.newgame
